blogPost.excerpt: Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals: prefilled workout databases that are filterable by equipment & fitness levels, exercise & nutrition logging, calendars, and more.
blogPost.body: Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals: prefilled workout databases that are filterable by equipment & fitness levels, exercise & nutrition logging, calendars, and more.
blogPost.title: HomeFitness OS - The all-in-one fitness system for Notion
blogPost.author: Jake Brokaw

localize.description: 实现你的健身目标所需的一切：预填的锻炼数据库，可通过设备和健身水平过滤，运动和营养记录，日历等。
實現你的健身目標所需的一切：預填的鍛鍊數據庫，可通過設備和健身水平過濾，運動和營養記錄，日曆等。

previous.excerpt: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
previous.title: auth. - 2FA , MFA, OTP, Secure Code for Apple devices

localize.description: Auth.是一款适合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。适用于所有苹果个人设备--支持交接和钥匙扣。扫描二维码就可以了! 或者你可以从你的供应商手动添加你的帐户。Safari扩展也可用于自动填写。
Auth.是一款適合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。適用於所有蘋果個人設備--支持交接和鑰匙扣。掃描二維碼就可以了! 或者你可以從你的供應商手動添加你的帳戶。Safari擴展也可用於自動填寫。

next.excerpt: OneUp allows you to schedule Google My Business posts for the future, as well as post to multiple Google My Business locations at the same time.
next.title: Google My Business post scheduler - Schedule GMB posts and even set them to automatically repeat

localize.description: OneUp 允许您为未来安排 Google My Business 帖子，以及同时发布到多个 Google My Business 位置。
localize.tagline: 安排GMB职位，甚至设置它们自动重复。

localize.description: OneUp 允許您爲未來安排 Google My Business 帖子，以及同時發佈到多個 Google My Business 位置。
localize.tagline: 安排GMB職位，甚至設置它們自動重複。
